bibl.title: "Botokudenphilologie" Vindicated: Review Article.
bibl.note: Article compte rendu de: Hans Dieter BETZ, The Greek Magical Papyri in Translation, Including the Demotic Spells. Second Edition (Chicago - London, 1992). - Non vidimus. Cf. APh 69 (2000) No. 2853.
